      protected static java.lang.String[] getDateFields(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input, java.lang.String[] fields)

      • isValidCommand

        protected static boolean isValidCommand(java.lang.String userInput)
        Finds whether the command input by the user is valid, with at least two words in length.
        Parameters:
        userInput -
        Returns:
        true if the command is at least 2 words long, false otherwise

      • getTaskFields

        protected static java.lang.String[] getTaskFields(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> input)
        Returns an array of string of length 4 containing the start and end dates and times of the input. Index 0 and 2 contains the start date and time respectively. Index 1 and 3 contains the end date and time.
        Parameters:
        input -
        Returns:
        a String array containing start and end date/times
